ovdesc.p: This file controls the maintenance of the LC.TYPES, which contains the Letter of Credit types allowed in the system with their narrative descriptions.
The records in this file can be defined by the user in order to set up customised types of Letters of Credit and Documentary Collections.
The table is used during the input and validation for L/C's to verify the credit types and details, and also to setup the default CATEGORY.CODE.
It is also used for the maintenance of L/C statistics in the form of a counter which is updated whenever a L/C is Pre-Advised, Opened, Expired and Closed.
